attributes.action: cannabis should be Legal to over 18's
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
cannabis should be Legal to over 18's

It grows naturally on the earth, and can be cultivated to be used in many different ways and profit can be made when sold in shops, it should come with warnings signs like smokes and booze, and people shold be allowed to grow it them selfs
